title: Neurophysician
steps: Complete MD in General Medicine (3 years)
Develop strong diagnostic and clinical reasoning skills
Learn EEG, EMG, and neuroimaging interpretation
Build patient communication and crisis-handling skills

title: Software Developer
steps: Learn a programming language (C++, Python, or Java)
Learn basic web development (HTML, CSS, JS)
Build small projects to strengthen logic
Learn Git, GitHub, and version control
Practice system design and interview questions

title: Data Scientist
steps: Build ML models and data pipelines

title: Civil Engineer
steps: Understand AutoCAD, STAAD Pro, and Revit
Complete internship or site work experience
Learn safety regulations and building codes

title: Graphic Designer
steps: Learn Photoshop, Illustrator, Figma, and Canva
Practice creating posters, logos, UI screens
Work with clients or freelancing platforms
